Enter your vote today!  A new poll has been created for the 
nbwrpg group:

This poll is designed with the purpose 
to know how many chances do you have 
to post and find the way to do things 
fair, fast and fun to all. How many 
times do you check that are new 
posts??? 

  o Three time by day 
  o Two times by day 
  o Once by day 
  o Once by every two days 
  o Once every 3 or 4 days 


To vote, please visit the following web page:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/nbwrpg/surveys?id=1176920  

Note: Please do not reply to this message. Poll votes are 
not collected via email. To vote, you must go to the Yahoo! Groups 
web site listed above.

Thanks!
